TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CustomAttributeData extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对加载到仅反射上下文的程序集、模块、类型、成员和参数的自定义属性数据的访问权限。

span.span: Provides access to custom attribute data for assemblies, modules, types, members and parameters that are loaded into the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在检查仅反射上下文中的代码无法执行，因此并不总是可以通过创建实例它们，然后检查其属性、 使用等方法检查自定义特性， ，等等.Code that is being examined in the reflection-only context cannot be executed, so it is not always possible to examine custom attributes by creating instances of them and then examining their properties, using methods like , , and so on. 如果该属性类型本身的代码加载到仅反射上下文，无法执行。If the code for the attribute type itself is loaded into the reflection-only context, it cannot be executed. 类属性的抽象，从而允许对自定义特性的仅反射上下文中的检查。The class allows examination of custom attributes in the reflection-only context by providing an abstraction for attributes. 此类的成员可以用于获取位置参数和命名自变量的属性。The members of this class can be used to obtain the positional arguments and named arguments of the attribute. 使用属性来获取一系列结构，表示位置的参数，并使用属性来获取一系列这些结构表示命名的参数。Use the property to get a list of structures that represent the positional arguments, and use the property to get a list of structures that represent the named arguments. > [!NOTE] > 结构仅提供了有关用于获取和设置参数值的特性属性的信息。The structure only provides information about the attribute property used to get and set the argument value. 若要获取的类型和参数的值，请使用属性来获取结构。To obtain the type and value of the argument, use the property to obtain a structure. 后是否已命名或位置，结构参数，使用属性获取的类型和属性来获取的值。When you have a structure for an argument, whether named or positional, use the property to get the type and the property to get the value. > [!NOTE] > 数组参数，对于属性返回一个泛型的对象。For an array argument, the property returns a generic of objects. 每个集合中的对象表示数组的相应元素。Each object in the collection represents the corresponding element of the array. 可以在执行上下文和仅反射上下文中使用。 can be used in the execution context as well as in the reflection-only context. 例如，你可能想要避免加载包含自定义特性的代码的程序集。For example, you might want to avoid loading the assembly that contains the code for a custom attribute. 使用类是不同于使用方法，如:Using the class is different from using methods like : - 属性和方法仅向你提供指定的值的特性实例，未在构造函数的语义。The properties and methods of only provide you with the values that were specified for the attribute instance, not the semantics of the constructor. 例如，可能会在内部转换为某些其他表示形式，并在规范的格式; 中返回属性的字符串自变量或执行实际的属性的代码时，一个属性可能有副作用。For example, a string argument of an attribute might be converted internally to some other representation, and returned in a canonical form; or a property might have side effects when the actual attribute code is executed. - 属性和方法不允许您检索从基类继承的自定义特性。The properties and methods of do not allow you to retrieve the custom attributes inherited from base classes. 若要创建的实例类中，使用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)工厂方法。To create instances of the class, use the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) factory methods. ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示有关已应用到它及类型和它包含的成员的自定义特性的信息。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays information about the custom attributes that were applied to it and to the type and members it contains. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生类调用的构造期间对象。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeType As Type
public: property Type ^ AttributeType { Type ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the type of the attribute.
The type of the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Constructor As ConstructorInfo
public: virtual property System::Reflection::ConstructorInfo ^ Constructor { System::Reflection::ConstructorInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，表示应已初始化自定义属性的构造函数。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the constructor that would have initialized the custom attribute.

value.span: 一个对象，表示应已初始化由 类的当前实例表示的自定义属性的构造函数。

span.span: An object that represents the constructor that would have initialized the custom attribute represented by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性类型具有多个构造函数，该属性返回只应已初始化由当前的特性实例的特定构造函数对象。If an attribute type has multiple constructors, this property returns only the particular constructor that would have initialized the attribute instance represented by the current object. ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 中使用属性`ShowAttributeData`显示自定义特性数据的方法。The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data. 在此代码示例中，返回此属性用于显示一个文本字符串，描述构造函数中，演示该属性返回会初始化该特性的构造函数。In this code example, the returned by this property is used to display a text string that describes the constructor, demonstrating that the property returns the constructor that would initialize the attribute. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ConstructorArguments As IList(Of CustomAttributeTypedArgument)

summary.span: 获取为由 对象表示的特性实例指定的位置参数列表。

span.span: Gets the list of positional arguments specified for the attribute instance represented by the object.

value.span: 一个结构的集合，表示为自定义特性实例指定的位置参数。

span.span: A collection of structures that represent the positional arguments specified for the custom attribute instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取指定的自定义属性实例而不执行任何自定义属性代码的位置参数。This method gets the positional arguments that were specified for the custom attribute instance without executing any of the custom attribute code. 因此，它可以在仅限反射上下文中使用。Thus, it can be used in the reflection-only context. 使用方法获取的特性实例指定的命名的参数。Use the method to get the named arguments specified for the attribute instance. ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 中使用属性`ShowAttributeData`显示自定义特性数据的方法。The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data. 在此代码示例中，此属性用于显示传递给构造函数初始化特性的参数列表。In this code example, this property is used to display the list of arguments passed to the constructor that initialized the attribute. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData> GetCustomAttributes(class System.Reflection.Assembly target) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCustomAttributes (target As Assembly) As IList(Of CustomAttributeData)

param.name: target
param.span: 要检索其自定义特性数据的程序集。

span.span: The assembly whose custom attribute data is to be retrieved.

summary.span: 返回 对象列表，这些对象表示已应用到目标程序集的特性相关数据。

span.span: Returns a list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target assembly.

returns.span: 对象的列表，表示已应用到目标程序集的特性相关数据。

span.span: A list of objects that represent data about the attributes that have been applied to the target assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种替代方法始终仅反射上下文中使用的方法。This method provides an alternative to the method that can always be used in the Reflection-only context. ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 方法中使用`Main()`若要获取应用于程序集的自定义特性。The method is used in `Main()` to get the custom attributes applied to the assembly. 该方法的返回值传递给`ShowAttributeData`方法。The return value of the method is passed to the `ShowAttributeData` method. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData> GetCustomAttributes(class System.Reflection.MemberInfo target) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCustomAttributes (target As MemberInfo) As IList(Of CustomAttributeData)

param.name: target
param.span: 要检索其特性数据的成员。

span.span: The member whose attribute data is to be retrieved.

summary.span: 返回 对象列表，这些对象表示已应用到目标成员的特性相关数据。

span.span: Returns a list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

returns.span: 对象的列表，表示已应用到目标成员的特性相关数据。

span.span: A list of objects that represent data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的重载获取自定义属性数据类型、 嵌套的类型和类型成员，因为类和中的类表示所有派生的类型成员的命名空间。This method overload gets custom attribute data for types, nested types, and type members, because the class and the classes in the namespace that represent type members all derive from . ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 中使用方法`Main()`若要获取已应用于类型和测试方法的自定义特性 (派生自)。The method is used in `Main()` to get the custom attributes that were applied to a type and to a test method ( derives from ). 返回值传递给`ShowAttributeData`方法。The return value of is passed to the `ShowAttributeData` method. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种替代方法始终仅反射上下文中使用的方法。This method provides an alternative to the method that can always be used in the Reflection-only context. ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 方法中使用`Main()`检索自定义属性应用于测试方法的参数。The method is used in `Main()` to retrieve the custom attributes applied to a parameter of a test method. 返回值传递给`ShowAttributeData`方法。The return value of is passed to the `ShowAttributeData` method. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取为由 对象表示的特性实例指定的命名参数列表。

span.span: Gets the list of named arguments specified for the attribute instance represented by the object.

value.span: 一个结构的集合，表示为自定义特性实例指定的命名参数。

span.span: A collection of structures that represent the named arguments specified for the custom attribute instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取指定的自定义属性实例而不执行任何自定义属性代码的命名的参数。This method gets the named arguments that were specified for the custom attribute instance without executing any of the custom attribute code. 因此，它可以在仅限反射上下文中使用。Thus, it can be used in the Reflection-only context. 返回的列表包含仅为此特性实例指定的命名的参数。The list that is returned contains only the named arguments that were specified for the attribute instance. 使用方法以获取指定的位置参数的特性实例。Use the method to get the positional arguments that were specified for the attribute instance. ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 中使用属性`ShowAttributeData`显示自定义特性数据的方法。The property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data. 在此代码示例中，此属性用于显示指定属性的命名参数列表。In this code example, this property is used to display the list of named arguments specified for the attribute. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回自定义特性的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Returns a string representation of the custom attribute.

returns.span: 一个表示自定义特性的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that represents the custom attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串值包含属性类型、 属性参数和命名的参数。The string value includes the attribute type, the attribute parameters, and the named parameters. ## Examples 下面的示例定义具有四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties. 两个属性是只读的并使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors. 其他两个属性是读/写，并可以仅通过使用命名参数进行设置。The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments. 一个位置属性是一个字符串、 数组和一个命名的属性是一个整数数组。One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers. 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method. 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。Different constructors are used for these cases. 执行时，该程序集本身加载到仅反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes. 应用于类型的属性说明数组属性，使用位置和命名参数。The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments. 在此示例中，方法中使用`ShowAttributeData`方法，以确定其数据显示的属性。In this example, the method is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method, to identify the attribute whose data is being displayed. [!code-cpp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CustomAttributeData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CustomAttributeData/VB/source.vb#1)]
